abstract: Veteran Ernest Cote, 101-year-old Canadian war veteran who was nearly killed by murder suspect Ian Bush during home invasion in Ottawa in December 2014, dies of natural causes.
lead_paragraph: The 101-year-old war veteran who was tied up and robbed in his Ottawa home in December, then left to suffocate with a plastic bag over his head, only to free himself and call the police, has died of natural causes.

headline.main: Canada: Survivor of Home Invasion Dies
headline.print_headline: Canada: Survivor of Home Invasion Dies

snippet: The 101-year-old war veteran who was tied up and robbed in his Ottawa home in December, then left to suffocate with a plastic bag over his head, only to free himself and call the police, has died of natural causes.
